newsitem.title: JAPAN: Asahi Mutual plans large domestic bond investment.
newsitem.headline: Asahi Mutual plans large domestic bond investment.

text.p: Asahi Mutual Life Insurance Co plans 500 billion yen worth of new domestic bond investment in the second half of the current business year, a company official told reporters on Wednesday.
The official also said the company plans to invest about 40-50 billion yen in foreign bonds in the same period.
Makoto Yokoyama, Asahi's manager of the asset allocation and planning department, said because interest rates may rise, the company plans to invest in short- and medium-term foreign bonds.
He also said the company's holdings in stocks may decrease.
